tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FashionTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT,
  image_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Images(id)
);
